level.text: This chapter shall apply to applicants for and holders of a license to practice as a funeral director or apprentice funeral director.
Chapters 31 (Funeral Services Establishments: Preneed Contracts) and 33 (General Rules: Funeral Directors, Veterinarians, and Interior Designers) of this title shall supplement this chapter.
The provisions of this chapter prevail in the event of a direct and irreconcilable conflict between this chapter and chapter 33 of this title.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง 4(i) of the D.C. Funeral Services Regulatory Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-84, D.C. Code ยง 2-2803(i) (1987 Supp.), and Mayor’s Order 87-186, issued August 3, 1987, 34 DCR 5480 (August 21, 1987).
